name: AutoFixx
description:
This game is a simple platform type game where you control a small robot tasked with repairing faulty items inside habitats on an alien planet before the humans arrive.

This is the first three levels, but I'm still working on it. I'll be adding more levels in the future, and will also continue to polish the game as my skills, hopefully, improve. 

The game was made entirely by me using only the GDevelop engine. If anyone donates any funds I will be sharing them with both Itch.io and the GDevelop team.
